item.title: HTTP status codes and their meanings
item.description: Source: Google Often time, we come across several errors while surfing through some websites which displays with a status code, as developers we need to be familiar with this status codes. In this article, I’d be explaining what each HTTP status code stand for. What is an HTTP status code? For every request from a web browser the server responds with a status code. If there was a error, you can get additional information about the error.
